title: AI-Driven Adaptive Microlearning Design for Language Acquisition

context.additional_context: Customized language learning design for learners with only smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose individual language learning patterns with 80% accuracy using AI-based analytical tools.
Learners can apply at least three types of personalized content recommended by deep learning models to actual learning scenarios.
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans based on learning data collected in microlearning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
